document.full_text: a british man was jailed for eight years on friday for his role in supplying more than 2 million doses of fake medicines in the most serious known case of counterfeit drugs getting into the european supply chain.
document.title: british man jailed after record fake medicine bust
lines_and_colors: a british man was jailed for eight years on friday for his role in supplying more than 2 million doses of fake medicines in the most serious known case of counterfeit drugs getting into the european supply chain.
